# init(windowScene:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns a new text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(windowScene: UIWindowScene)
```

## Creating a Text-Formatting Coordinator

- **init(for:)**: Creates a text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.
